alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 02 at 5:26AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Gallatin National Forest Avalanche Center in Bozeman has ISSUED an BACKCOUNTRY AVALANCHE WARNING which is in effect until 6 AM Saturday... * WHAT...Avalanche warning. The avalanche danger is HIGH on all slopes. Natural and human-triggered slides are very likely. * WHERE...The Centennial Mountains outside of Island Park. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Saturday. * IMPACTS...A large amount of new snow with strong wind are creating unstable conditions over a wide area. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Backcountry travelers should stay off of, and out from underneath, slopes steeper than 30 degrees. Avalanches may run long distances and can run into mature forests. Choose conservative terrain. Consult www.mtavalanche.com for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center. Check www.avalanche.org for your closest avalanche center. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION.. This warning does not apply to ski areas where avalanche mitigation measures are performed.
